sentences:
Sentence 0:
Expression in yeast (Saccharomyces cerevisiae) shows that AtSTP6 is a high-affinity (K(m) = 20 microM), broad-spectrum, and uncoupler-sensitive monosaccharide transporter that is targeted to the plasma membrane and that can complement a growth deficiency resulting from the disruption of most yeast hexose transporter genes.
sentence_raw: Expression in yeast (Saccharomyces cerevisiae) shows that AtSTP6 is a high-affinity (K(m) = 20 microM), broad-spectrum, and uncoupler-sensitive monosaccharide transporter that is targeted to the plasma membrane and that can complement a growth deficiency resulting from the disruption of most yeast hexose transporter genes.
